ovdesc.p: This file is used to define whether bank uses pre-printed paper or the address of the lead company/branch company should be displayed in the statements, notices and advices sent from T24

desc.p: Message Type (@Id of DE.FORMAT.PRINT or DEAL.SLIP.FORMAT)
This field allow the user to enter description.
This field is used to define whether pre-printed paper is used or
Lead Company or Branch Company address is used to display the bank address in advices/notices sent out from T24.
